body.p: Incorrect spellings (as found in the blacklisting dictionary) should not appear in the running text

section.title: Good text
section.p: The abandoned (one n) building is an aberration (double r).
According the style guide, "filename" should be written as a single word.

section.title: Bad text
section.p: The abandonned building is an aberation.
According the style guide, "file name" is incorrect.
